entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android app showed a black screen #27983
  • [Android] [Shell] Tabbar disappears before navigation #27980
  • [iOS] CV1's footer doesn't increase its size #27978
  • [9.0 Windows] dotnet publish creates a package for which Windows Runtime Metadata validation fails #27977

Closed

  • Migrate Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests to device tests #27303
    Backlog
  • Make the "void" InvokeJavaScriptAsync method public #27191
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [9.0 Windows] VS Publish command and dotnet publish command yield different packages (dll's are of different size) #27976
  • More information when provisioning goes wrong #27940
  • new Couchbase.Lite.Database() throws an DllNotFoundException when built for iOS Release target #27944

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize CI builds #27985
  • Make ShadowTypeConverter public for .NET 10 #27984
    t/breaking 💥, area-xaml, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 11059998 #27982
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] CV1's footer doesn't increase its size - fix #27979
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Properly Resolve File Paths in FilePicker When MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is Granted #27975
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [MacCatalyst] Picker focus events #27973
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 4 #27561
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 13 #27904
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 12 #27804
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Fix flaky tests 6 #27874
    area-testing, testing-flakiness, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 1 #27695
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload - Handle fingerprint when hot reloading scoped CSS bundles #27788
    area-tooling
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20250219211456120 to main #27915
    area-localization, .NET 9 SR5
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview1] Update more preview1 versions #27956
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview1
  • [ci] Move more runs to Sequoia #27972
    area-infrastructure
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #27967
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Testing] More changes in capabilities to adjust Appium timeouts #27675
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Run tests verifying snapshots on mac now that's possible #27893
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

Updated

  • CollectionView2 Items display issue when Header/Footer is resized on iOS #27076
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion/review
  • [iOS] CollectionView 1's doesn't adjust its offset when resizing a footer #27963
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS][Shell][More Tab] Navigation from the 'More' tab - improvements #27932
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 3 #27905
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 14 #27906
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Fixed the Header and Footer-Name textbox is cut off in collection view #26947
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix VerticalOffset Update When Modifying CollectionView.ItemsSource While Scrolled #26782
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] CollectionView with header and "complex" item will have the wrong position after a refresh with a RefreshView #26575
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] CV - Reset ScrollOffset when item source changes #26376
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • Fix iOS] Fix CarouselViewLoopNoFreeze so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #26053
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • remove Dispose call on ShellItemRenderer #27890
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Essentials] Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled #27941
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-geolocation
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 1 #26696
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 3 #26751
    community ✨, area-controls-image, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Shell Navigation to a page without a Tabbar #27779
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 10 #27751
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 9 #27743
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 11 #27764
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS][Shell][More Tab] The 'More' tab - nav bar customization #27848
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell
